name: Alpha and Omega
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)



Kate and Humphrey are two wolves who are nothing alike. When they are taken from their home by park rangers, they must work together to make the long journey back to bring peace to their beloved Jasper Park!

Aid Kate and Humphrey on their journey through four exciting mini games woven into an interactive story telling experience!

Features

• Play through an story mode inspired by the film.• 4 mini games including Log Racing and Goose Golf.• Over 30 levels of Log Racing fun.• Over 30 different Goose Golf holds to master.
